content: sew arms to body just below the neck where shoulders would be page 4 of 8 copyright by sherri bush http //www ravelry com/designers/sherri-bush sherricrochets@gmail com little legs make 2 row instruction stitches 1 starting with black 6 chain 2 6 single_crochet in second chain from hook join chain 1 2 *2 single_crochet in each single_crochet* around 12 3 work even single_crochet in each single_crochet around 12 change to white at end of this row 4 *decrease over next 2 single_crochet* around 6 5 work even 6 switch to your skin color at the end of this row then stuff the foot firmly 6 - work even 6 15 slip_stitch join and bind off leave a tail about 8 long so you can 6 sew the legs to the body do not stuff the rest of the leg using black or your shoe color make a strap across the top of the shoe / foot sew legs to body using pictures as guide see below page 5 of 8 copyright by sherri bush http //www ravelry com/designers/sherri-bush sherricrochets@gmail com putting it all together putting little girl together should be pretty straight forward the head and neck should both have 12 stitches so should be easily sewn together the arms should be attached one row below the neck attach the hair in the front loops left on the head the legs are sewn on between row 1 & 2 of the body the picture on the left is the foot / shoe before the straps were added and obviously the picture on the right is afterwards i just used black yarn across the foot where i thought it looked like a strap should go and tied it off page 6 of 8 copyright by sherri bush http //www ravelry com/designers/sherri-bush sherricrochets@gmail com the last thing you need to do is embroider a face and decide on a hairstyle for the faces i like to use 2 srands of a 4 ply yarn i make x s for the eyes and lines for the mouth give your little girl a nose if you d like little girl with pigtails little girl with a pony tail page 7 of 8 copyright by sherri bush http //www ravelry com/designers/sherri-bush sherricrochets@gmail com and in this photo little girl is wearing her hair down with braids tied in the back enjoy and have fun page 8 of 8 copyright by sherri bush http //www ravelry com/designers/sherri-bush sherricrochets@gmail com
